item.description:
Expanding Your Networks

How we cultivate and use our networks can be a key to our success in business and in life. This event will be dedicated to the "how to's" of networking and building strong relationships that can grow stronger throughout the years. Please come with your ideas, experiences and questions about networking to share with the group.

1. Introductions (15 mins)

3. Moderated discussion on building, maintaining and using your networks (1 hour)

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.why: Great people, opportunity to network, learn and share from a dynamic group of nonprofit professionals and volunteers.
item.name: January Event "Expanding Your Networks"
